latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Monitoring Inspection Non-Routine - Reinspection Required Fines pending

infractions.Violation Summary: Camp Operator fails to provide adequate supervision
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: All camper and staff injuries illness and conditions reportable pursuant to HC Article 11 were not reported Medical log not complete and/or updated
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Health Director not qualified MD Nurse EMT Health Director not on site at overnight camp not available to summer day and traveling camps Assistant was not designated where required
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Camp operator fails to maintains staff records application qualifications certifications not on file or available for inspection employees education experience training and references not verified
DOHMH not notified 30 days prior to development modification or conversion of a property into a Camp Notification incomplete
All camp staff have not had recent medical exam including TB testing as required by the Dept
